meaning_str.bing:
n. 农场；养殖场；农舍；饲养场
v. 种田；务农；从事畜牧业
网络. 农庄；农田；耕种

农场；养殖场；农舍；饲养场

农场；农舍；养殖场；饲养场；农田；农业用地
耕种；务农；种田；经营农业；从事农场工作；从事畜牧业

sogou-kaoyan.v: 种植; 养殖[出现3次)];务农[出现0次)]

sogou-CET6.n/v: 农场; 养殖场; 耕种; 养殖[出现24次)]

sogou-CET4.n/v: 农场; 养殖场; 耕种; 养殖[出现20次)]

sogou-gaokao.n/v: 农场; 耕种; 养殖[出现5次)]

sogou-zhongkao.n/v: 农场; 养殖场; 耕种; 养殖[出现74次)]

1.en: As if to prove a point, the student's first show was an adaptation of George Orwell's Animal Farm.
1.cn: 似乎是为了证明这一点，学生们的第一个表演改编自乔治奥威尔的“动物庄园”。

2.en: On his death the farmer who owned it decided to put farm workers in it, and told the Durbeyfields to leave.
2.cn: 因为他死了，农场主——也就是房主人决定让农场工人们住到这里，叫德比一家都搬走。

3.en: My next case, three months later, was to make a bust of a girl whose charred skeleton had been found in Pennsylvania after a fire at a farm.
3.cn: 3个月后，我接到了下一个案子，为一个女孩制作胸像。有人在宾夕法尼亚州的一场农场大火之后发现了她已经被烧焦的骨架。

0.en: Can we discuss Yew Tree Farm? What about it?
0.cn: 我们能说说紫杉农场吗？怎么了？

1.en: King's Barrow is a working farm. There isn't a spare farmyard half as accessible as here.
1.cn: 金斯巴罗农场在运作，没有更近的闲置农场了。

2.en: Thank you. Do you have far to go? I'm staying at Yew Tree Farm.
2.cn: 谢谢您。你住哪？紫杉农场。

3.en: The only reason he was there was to try to save our farm.
3.cn: 他出现在那里仅仅是为了挽救我们的农场。

4.en: You want to take them to the Drewes' farm? You can come with us if you like.
4.cn: 你想带他们去德鲁家的农场吗？你想来也可以啊。

5.en: It's a pity it should be Yew Tree. It would've filled a hole in the land we farm.
5.cn: 只可惜了紫杉农场，本来刚好可以填补我们的耕地。

6.en: All downhill from here, down to the floodplain. Farm at the bottom of the world.
6.cn: 从这往山下走，一直下到平原，最低的地方就是农场。

7.en: Well, you should have just stayed on the carrot farm? It really is too bad, I did like you.
7.cn: 你就该呆在胡萝卜农场里，太可惜了，我挺喜欢你的。

8.en: We worked till, I think, I fainted. But we managed to stop the water. We saved the farm.
8.cn: 我们一直挖，直到我累昏过去，但我们成功挡住了洪水，救了农场。

9.en: Marie Audet is a second-generation dairy farmer who doesn't let anything go to waste on her farm.
9.cn: 玛丽·奥迪特是第二代奶农，她不允许她的农场有任何浪费。

10.en: Maybe I should take a page out of Barton's book. Build Pepper a farm, hope nobody blows it up.
10.cn: 或许我向巴顿学习一下，给佩珀建个农场，但愿没人想炸翻它。

11.en: The system cost Marie and her farm over $1 million, which they've paid off in just seven years.
11.cn: 这个系统花了玛丽和她的农场100多万美元，他们在七年内就还清了。

12.en: First, it made things perfect. Then it decided to see what happens if you shake the ant farm.
12.cn: 首先，一切都设计地完美无缺，然后决定试试，摇晃蚂蚁农场，观察反应。

13.en: What you've got in the weapon there, those are blueberries, from my family's farm. They are delicious. You should try some.
13.cn: 你武器里的是我家里农场种的蓝莓，可好吃了，你该尝尝。

14.en: Right. I'm going now. I'll be at my farm if you need me. And take care of that Committee issue.
14.cn: 好吧，我要走了，如果有事，去我的农场找我。还有搞定那个委员会的事情。

15.en: Hey, guys. Hi! How are you? Hi. Where are Cam and Lily? They're still at the farm. I got banished.
15.cn: 大家好。你怎么样？小卡和莉莉在哪里？他们还在农场，我被驱逐出场了。

16.en: And then when they get old, they'll go to that special farm that Chandler took the other chick and duck to.
16.cn: 以后要是老了的话，钱德可以和上次一样把它们送到上次那个农场去。

17.en: So Mr Drewe's accepted your offer. I'm so pleased. The Drewes have been at Yew Tree Farm for many years.
17.cn: 德鲁先生接受你们的提议喽。我太开心了，德鲁家在紫杉农场工作了许多年。

18.en: Later that day we found out we blocked the water all right. We sent it upstream. The whole Lang farm washed away.
18.cn: 后来我们发现，我们挡住了洪水，洪水回流，朗家的整个农场都被冲没了。

19.en: But he would've hated himself even more if he'd lost our farm, if he hadn't been able to provide and support his family.
19.cn: 但如果不能保住我们的农场，他会更痛恨自己，如果他不能养活自己的家人。
